issue.title: model plugin with repeated elements segfaults if plugin attempts to read them
model plugin with repeated elements segfaults if plugin attempts to read them
model plugin with repeated elements segfaults if plugin attempts to read them
model plugin with repeated elements segfaults if plugin attempts to read them
model plugin with repeated elements segfaults if plugin attempts to read them

content.html:
I can't reproduce this error.

Here is the proper code:

    sdf::ElementPtr p = _sdf->GetElement("test");
    if (p)
         gzerr << "this works ok " << p->GetValueString() << "\n";

    p = p->GetNextElement("test");
    if (p)
        gzerr << "this works " << p->GetValueString() << "\n";

The posted version did not segfault, but it didn't get the second value, but that is expected behavior.

issue.title: model plugin with repeated elements segfaults if plugin attempts to read them

content.raw:
sorry, false alarm due to multiple versions of gazebo on my computer, now I recognize this backtrace:
~~~
(gdb) bt
#0  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007ffff714948e in gazebo::physics::Model::LoadPlugin (this=0xd29360, _sdf=...) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_patches/gazebo/physics/Model.cc:708
#2  0x00007ffff7148fa1 in gazebo::physics::Model::LoadPlugins (this=0xd29360) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_patches/gazebo/physics/Model.cc:684
#3  0x00007ffff714514c in gazebo::physics::Model::Update (this=0xd29360) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_patches/gazebo/physics/Model.cc:202
#4  0x00007ffff7173a72 in gazebo::physics::World::ModelUpdateSingleLoop (this=0xcb77c0) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_patches/gazebo/physics/World.cc:879
#5  0x00007ffff7170d52 in gazebo::physics::World::Update (this=0xcb77c0) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_patches/gazebo/physics/World.cc:376
#6  0x00007ffff7170904 in gazebo::physics::World::Step (this=0xcb77c0) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_patches/gazebo/physics/World.cc:320
#7  0x00007ffff717055c in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop (this=0xcb77c0) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_patches/gazebo/physics/World.cc:289
#8  0x00007ffff71891a0 in boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::physics::World>::operator() (this=0xfb1ce8, p=0xcb77c0)
    at /usr/include/boost/bind/mem_fn_template.hpp:49
#9  0x00007ffff7188752 in boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::physics::World*> >::operator()<boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::physics::World>, boost::_bi::list0> (this=0xfb1cf8, f=..., a=...) at /usr/include/boost/bind/bind.hpp:253
#10 0x00007ffff7187d3d in boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::physics::World>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::physics::World*> > >::operator() (this=0xfb1ce8) at /usr/include/boost/bind/bind_template.hpp:20
#11 0x00007ffff718a5bc in boost::detail::thread_data<boost::_bi::bind_t<void, boost::_mfi::mf0<void, gazebo::physics::World>, boost::_bi::list1<boost::_bi::value<gazebo::physics::World*> > > >::run (this=0xfb1b60) at /usr/include/boost/thread/detail/thread.hpp:61
#12 0x00007ffff6005ce9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#13 0x00007ffff670ce9a in start_thread (arg=0x7fffd605a700) at pthread_create.c:308
#14 0x00007ffff53aecbd in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#15 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) 
~~~
different gazebo dynamic libraries being loaded at run time.
